key_observations: Contains handleResetFilters function currently using window.location.reload()
Empty state UI lacks a proper Reset Filters button
Has a TODO comment noting reset functionality should be passed from parent
Contains existing resetFilters() function with default filter values
Provides a reusable pattern for resetting filters

patterns_discovered: Passing callback functions from parent to child components for state management
Removing full page reloads in favor of state-based updates
Standardizing filter reset logic across components
gotchas_discovered: Lack of explicit reset button in empty state UI
Missing prop interface for reset callback

approach_outcome.primary_change: Add onResetFilters prop to IncidentListProps interface

recommendations: Create a memoized resetFilters callback in page.tsx
Add explicit 'Reset Filters' button to empty state UI
Implement prop-based state reset instead of page reload
Ensure filter reset maintains current application context
Add unit tests to verify filter reset functionality
